titles.title: Supporting Future Educators Act of 2017
Supporting Future Educators Act of 2017

A bill to support the preparation and retention of outstanding educators in all fields to ensure a bright future for children in under-resourced, under-served communities in the United States, and for other purposes.
Supporting Future Educators Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
